Detailed Description

Mercury API - Gen2 tag information and interfaces.

Author:
Brian Fiegel
Date:
5/7/2009

Define Documentation

#define TMR_GEN2_MAX_PC_BYTE_COUNT   (6)

Size allocated for storing PC data in TMR_GEN2_TagData

Typedef Documentation

typedef uint32_t TMR_GEN2_Password

A 32-bit password (access or kill) in the Gen2 protocol.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum TMR_GEN2_Bank

Gen2 memory banks

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_BANK_RESERVED  Reserved bank (kill and access passwords)
TMR_GEN2_BANK_EPC  EPC memory bank
TMR_GEN2_BANK_TID  TID memory bank
TMR_GEN2_BANK_USER  User memory bank

enum TMR_GEN2_DivideRatio

Gen2 divide ratio values

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_DIVIDE_RATIO_8  DR of 8
TMR_GEN2_DIVIDE_RATIO_64_3  DR of 64/3

enum TMR_GEN2_LinkFrequency

Gen2 link frequencies

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_LINKFREQUENCY_250KHZ  250 kHz
TMR_GEN2_LINKFREQUENCY_640KHZ  640 kHz

enum TMR_GEN2_LockBits

Memory lock bits

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_USER_PERM  User memory bank lock permalock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_USER  User memory bank lock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_TID_PERM  TID memory bank lock permalock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_TID  TID memory bank lock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_EPC_PERM  EPC memory bank lock permalock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_EPC  EPC memory bank lock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_ACCESS_PERM  Access password lock permalock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_ACCESS  Access password lock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_KILL_PERM  Kill password lock permalock bit
TMR_GEN2_LOCK_BITS_KILL  Kill password lock bit

enum TMR_GEN2_Session

Gen2 session values

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_SESSION_S0  Session 0
TMR_GEN2_SESSION_S1  Session 1
TMR_GEN2_SESSION_S2  Session 2
TMR_GEN2_SESSION_S3  Session 3

enum TMR_GEN2_TagEncoding

Gen2 tag encoding modulation values

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_FM0  FM0
TMR_GEN2_MILLER_M_2  M = 2
TMR_GEN2_MILLER_M_4  M = 4
TMR_GEN2_MILLER_M_8  M = 8

enum TMR_GEN2_Target

Gen2 target search algorithms

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_TARGET_A  Search target A
TMR_GEN2_TARGET_B  Search target B
TMR_GEN2_TARGET_AB  Search target A until exhausted, then search target B
TMR_GEN2_TARGET_BA  Search target B until exhausted, then search target A

enum TMR_GEN2_Tari

Gen2 Tari values

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_TARI_25US  Tari of 25 microseconds
TMR_GEN2_TARI_12_5US  Tari of 12.5 microseconds
TMR_GEN2_TARI_6_25US  Tari of 6.25 microseconds

enum TMR_GEN2_TrExt

Gen2 TrExt bit

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_TR_EXT_NO_PILOT_TONE  No pilot tone in tag response
TMR_GEN2_TR_EXT_PILOT_TONE  Pilot tone in tag response

enum TMR_GEN2_WriteMode

Gen2 WriteMode

Enumerator:
TMR_GEN2_WORD_ONLY  WORD ONLY
TMR_GEN2_BLOCK_ONLY  BLOCK ONLY
TMR_GEN2_BLOCK_FALLBACK  BLOCK FALLBACK

enum TMR_SR_GEN2_SiliconType

Defines the values for different gen2 silicon types.
